response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and highly valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth, which I believe could greatly benefit someone like yourself. Considering its exceptional qualities and rarity, I am extending an offer to purchase it for $1,200,000. I understand that the true value might be subjective, but I am confident that this proposal reflects the product's true worth and potential impact on your endeavors. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or consider my offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable item into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
